meanings.definition: In no manner or degree; not at all.
meanings.sent1: I noway want to eat broccoli.
meanings.sent3: Noway am I going to wear that silly hat.
meanings.sent4: Finishing the race in first place was noway easy.
meanings.sent5: The storm was noway gentle as it raged on.

meanings.definition: Used to express strong denial or refusal.
meanings.sent3: Noway am I going to let you cheat.
meanings.sent4: The idea of jumping off a cliff? Noway!
meanings.sent5: Noway can you make me change my mind.

meanings.definition: Used to indicate that something is impossible or unlikely.
meanings.sent1: There is noway I can finish all this work today.
meanings.sent2: Noway will he agree to those terms.
meanings.sent3: Noway am I going to fit in that tiny box.
meanings.sent4: The chances of winning the lottery are noway.
meanings.sent5: The mountain was noway climbable without proper gear.
